title: Parthenia, or The mayden-head of the first musicke that ever vvas printed for the virginalls. Composed by three famous masters: William Byrd, Dr: John Bull, & Orlando Gibbons, gentlemen of his Majesties chappell. Dedicated to all the masters and lovers of musick
author: Byrd, William, 1542 or 3-1623.
publisher: Printed for John Clarke, at the lower end of Cheapside, entring [sic] into Mercers Chappell,
notes: At foot of title page: Cum Privilegio.
Except for letterpress title page, engraved throughout.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
